name: class-04
description: <!-- Bundler ka km kya hota h hmare code ko optimize way m likhna  --> <!-- Ab mera HTML react se jo render kia tha wo show nhi hora kyu nhi hora kyuki hmne phele cdn link dale hue react ke or react-dom ke the bss ab html wala hi show hora h --> <!-- ab hme use krege react or react-dom jo hmare node modules ke andr rkha hua h --> <!-- ye krna hoga bss import React from 'react" or import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client' --> <!-- Cannot use import statement outside a module ye error arri h console m  ye isliye arri h import hmari hai to javascript hi but ye modern javascript ka part h-- iss error ko htane ke liye mujhe apne script tag m type="module likhna pdega but ye ab bhi nhi phechan para to hhme ab teriminal m  npx parcel index.html asa krne se ye ek localhost server create krke de dega>
